data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tang, Hongqu, Cranston, Peter S. (2017): Review of Nilodosis Kieffer (Diptera: Chironomidae: Chironominae), with description of a new species from South China. Zootaxa 4353 (2): 339-346, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4353.2.5|10 occurrences
